roleset.name: elevate in status

example.name: transitive
example.text: Tolek Alterman had returned from the colonies in Palestine and , before the national leadership , exalted the miracles of [*] drying up swamps and irrigating the desert .
example.arg: the miracles of [*] drying up swamps and irrigating the desert

roleset.note: Framed by Ben based on sentences in brown; adjectival 'exalted' by Julia based on BOLT-6. Member of VNcls admire-31.2.

example.name: adjectival rel: exalted
example.text: A president is = exalted and majestic , how could he lower his noble head ?
